name: Re-Succoilent
description:
Game made in less than 48 hours for the GMTKJam 2020. The theme was "Out Of Control".

The once green and lively lands of the earth are now dead and barren. As far as you know, you might be the only plant left.

You play as a succulent plant, only able to move using the recoil of its blaster.

Hope you'll enjoy. Thank you!

Rens

Music from Free Music Archive - by Monplaisir
